name: G - Universe Gouf Crimson Custom
text: When this card is Summoned: Special Summon 1 Level 8 or lower "G - Universe" Ritual Monster from your GY. You can only use this effect of "G - Universe Gouf Crimson Custom" once per turn.
pendulum_text: When this card is activated: Ritual Summon 1 "G - Universe" monster by banishing Machine monsters from your GY or Pendulum Zones
